page.title: 10How To Spend A Saturday
page.content:
I am called Carl Marsh and I am 11 years old.I live at 5 Boston Way Barwell. Every Saturday morning when I get up I have my breakfast and watch Saturday Super Store.At about ten O'Clock I get dressed and go out to play.I play cricket or football.I come in at about one o'clock.I have lunch.Lunch is either french bread and cheese or a barbecue.After lunch I go and play squash.I come back at about 4.30pm and watch television. At 5.30pm I have tea.Tea is usually hot dogs. After tea I watch Dynesty and then I go to bed.
{Carl Marsh BJS.Cl.12}
